title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Sex crimes: Unraveling the facts about the offenders and the evidence
description: An investigative reporter's guide to uncovering facts about sex crimes, including requesting records on rape kits and district attorney prosecution rates, comparing police departments and district attorneys, and utilizing outside resources.
